buildings.name: Cleansing Cauldron
buildings.description: Cleanse corrupted Drake supplies so they can be consumed.

buildings.name: Thatched Bed
buildings.description: A simple thatch of leaves and twigs. Good for a single night, but it'll help a Drake recover their energy. Provides Sleep.

buildings.name: Poppet
buildings.description: A fragile Poppet, not built to last. Gives a bit of joy to a Drake before crumbling to pieces. Provides Entertainment.

buildings.name: Simple Curio Workshop
buildings.description: A simple workshop where you can unlock and create enchanted Curios.

buildings.name: Yoga Ball
buildings.description: Help your village-dwelling friends align their chakras through the ancients art of messing around on a giant rubber Yoga Ball. Provides Entertainment.

buildings.name: Cleansing Well
buildings.description: A Well, not useful for irrigation, but a nice place for Drakes to have a sip & quench their thirst. Provides daily water for close to 3 Drakes.

buildings.name: Bed
buildings.description: A place for Drakes to rest. Every Drakes needs a bed. Provides Sleep.

buildings.name: Planter
buildings.description: A place to grow your vegetables. Plant some seeds, set it and forget it. Provides Food.

buildings.name: Fir Tree
buildings.description: Tall and elegant, the Fir stands strong against the elements year round.

buildings.name: Wood Fence
buildings.description: A low wall.

buildings.name: Bunk Bed
buildings.description: The perfect place for a Drake slumber party. Provides Sleep.

buildings.name: Treadmill
buildings.description: A treadmill in which a running Drake can produce power.

buildings.name: Advanced Curio Workshop
buildings.description: A forge designed to shape the power of the Glowstones into useful tools to help push back the corruption and expand your village.

buildings.name: Pinball Machine
buildings.description: Old-school classic gaming, it'll keep a Drake engaged for hours. Provides Entertainment.

buildings.name: Blighted Water Pump
buildings.description: Pulls blighted water from deep within the soil.

buildings.name: Tub Planter
buildings.description: An efficient bathtub planter. Provides Food.

buildings.name: Water Relay
buildings.description: Keep the flow moving with a Water Relay

buildings.name: Power Relay
buildings.description: Keep your connections tidy with a Power Relay.

buildings.name: Tall Wood Fence
buildings.description: A high wall.

buildings.name: Pine Tree
buildings.description: A Pine, bred annually and a prized catch around the Christmas holiday.

buildings.name: Lobster Pen
buildings.description: Home of future lobster rolls. Provides Food.

buildings.name: Electric Water Pump
buildings.description: As if by magic, convert power into water.

buildings.name: Cleansing Water Cooler
buildings.description: A crystal-infused tank that purifies the blighted water that comes from the soil. Stores Water.

buildings.name: Greenhouse
buildings.description: A greenhouse. Provides Food.

buildings.name: Small Battery
buildings.description: A small battery used to hold power.

buildings.name: Spinning Chopper
buildings.description: Convert power into spinning blades of death.

buildings.name: Bunker
buildings.description: A former battle bus, now a battle-sits-still thing. Provides cover for a Drake as well as plenty of blow darts.

buildings.name: Birch Tree
buildings.description: A beautiful accent tree to liven up your camp.

buildings.name: Windmill
buildings.description: Harness the power of the wind to generate electricity.

buildings.name: Wood Gate
buildings.description: A gate.

buildings.name: Disco Floor
buildings.description: The Drakes would dance all day on this if they could. Provides Entertainment.

buildings.name: Disco Floor
buildings.description: The Drakes would dance all day on this if they could. Provides Entertainment.

buildings.name: Tesla Coil
buildings.description: When powered up, a potent defensive machine capable of zapping incoming threats. Somehow smart enough to not zap you or Drakes.

buildings.name: Hot Tub
buildings.description: A fun and relaxing way for Drakes to unwind after a hard day of lounging around and not really doing much. Provides Entertainment.

buildings.name: Metal Fence
buildings.description: A strong and sturdy metal fence.

buildings.name: Swing Set
buildings.description: A fun diversion for Drakes from their normal terrestrial existance. Provides Entertainment.

buildings.name: Solar Panel
buildings.description: Go green with clean, natural solar power.

buildings.name: Cleansed Water Alchemizer
buildings.description: Produces blighted water from thin air.

buildings.name: Tall Metal Fence
buildings.description: A taller variation of the Metal Fence.

buildings.name: Maple Tree
buildings.description: A summer time climbing favorite for kids.

buildings.name: Stone Wall
buildings.description: A wall made of various stones and rocks.

buildings.name: Massage Bed
buildings.description: A magic-fingers, vibrating massage bed leads to deeper more restful sleep Provides Sleep and Entertainment.

buildings.name: Ballista
buildings.description: A powerful, ballistic defensive weapon, launches projectiles into raiding foes when operated by a Drake.

buildings.name: Cleansing Water Tank
buildings.description: An enourmous tank that can store an extraordinary supply of water as it cleanses and purifies it. Stores Water.

buildings.name: Wood Stove
buildings.description: A stove that emits limited warmth.

buildings.name: Puppet Show
buildings.description: The Drakes entertain each other by putting on an award-winning puppet show. Provides Entertainment.

buildings.name: Large Battery
buildings.description: A larger battery that can hold are large amount of power.

buildings.name: Tall Stone Wall
buildings.description: A taller wall made of various stones and rocks.

buildings.name: Hydroponic Greenhouse
buildings.description: This Hydroponic Greenhouse meets all the necessary needs to feed plenty of Drakes. Provides Food.

buildings.name: Space Heater
buildings.description: A space heater for the Drakes to feel cozy and at home during the winter.

buildings.name: Oak Tree
buildings.description: Ancient and elegant, a proud tree.

buildings.name: Pumpkin Patch
buildings.description: Pumpkins are some of the Drakes' favorite treats, and this farm alwats provides them with nourishment opportunities. Provides Food.

buildings.name: Electric Fence
buildings.description: Provides a boot to defense as enemies will be shocked by this fence.

buildings.name: Tall Electric Fence
buildings.description: A taller variation of the Electric Fence.

buildings.name: Metal Gate
buildings.description: An extremely strong gate for friendly Drakes to exit and enter the camp.

buildings.name: Radiator
buildings.description: Radiator to warm up large spaces.

buildings.name: Geothermal Heater
buildings.description: Geothermal Heater is not only environmentally safe, but also heats up a very large area for the camp.

buildings.name: Geothermal Generator
buildings.description: An environmentally-conscious and powerful generator.
